instructions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Spread split sides of English muffins with margarine and sprinkle lightly with garlic powder. Broil for 1 minute.
Divide roast beef evenly among bottom halves of muffins. Place muffin tops on roast beef and wrap each tightly in foil.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until heated through. For each sandwich, put 1/3-cup gravy in a small bowl. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/2 pound cooked roast beef, thinly sliced (may use leftovers or from deli)
1 1/3 cups canned au jus gravy, heated
title: English Dip Sandwiches
